content: I'd like to know the rules.

content: I have a set of <style=Highlight>numbered cards</style> ranging from <style=Highlight>1</style> to <style=Highlight>9</style>. I'll draw two cards first.
info: NPC小游戏模板-4-找中间-1013萨飞里_4-找中间

content: If the number you draw falls <style=Highlight>between</style> the two numbers I picked, you win!
info: NPC小游戏模板-4-找中间-1013萨飞里_4-找中间
